tour_welcome: Welcome to your personalized dashboard! Let us guide you.
tour_step_1: Step 1: Book your appointment easily from here.
tour_step_2: Step 2: View your past test results.
tour_step_3: Step 3: Reach out to our support team for assistance.
error_message: Something went wrong, please try again later.
confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout_confirmation: Logging out will end your current session. Do you wish to continue?
login_error: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
appointment_success: Your appointment has been successfully booked!
appointment_error: Sorry, something went wrong while booking your appointment.
test_order_success: Your test has been successfully ordered. We will notify you once the results are ready.
test_order_error: Sorry, we encountered an issue while placing your test order. Please try again later.
